correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and non-compliant due to mixing multiple experiments, unit errors, nulls, and invented values. Key issues: (1) Semantic incoherence/mixing of processes: temperature is 85 °C and dosing/purge times 0.5 s/20 s (membrane case), but GPC (1.76 Å/cycle), number of cycles (2500), and film thickness (440 nm) are from the 220 °C flat-Si run. Substrate is listed as “Silicon wafer,” which conflicts with the 85 °C membrane parameters. (2) Missing multiple processes: the article reports several distinct ALD runs (flat Si at 220 °C with 0.25/0.5 s pulses; membranes at 85 °C and 250 °C with 0.5/20 s pulses; membranes with longer 1.5/45 s pulses; Si nanopores at 250 °C with 0.5/20 s). Only one conflated process is extracted instead of multiple separate processes. (3) Unit errors: dosingTime and purgeTime use unit MilliSEC but numeric values are in seconds; 0.5 s and 20 s should be 500 ms and 20000 ms, not 0.5 and 20. Resistivity reported as 0.03 Ohm·cm in the article is encoded as 0.03 Ohm·m; if using Ohm·m it should be 0.0003. (4) Schema violations/nulls: plasmaPower=None; nucleationPeriod, flowRates, uniformity.variation, roughness.value, filmDensity.value all set to null; deviceProperties fields all null; supercycleDesign=None. The schema and task prohibit null/empty values—omit optional fields or supply valid values. (5) Unsupported/invented values: filmComposition.atomicRatio set to 1:1 with XRD (article does not report atomic ratio; XRD is not an atomic ratio technique). ElementalConcentration has nulls despite being required by the schema section. Roughness characterized by SEM without a value; filmDensity cites XRR though XRR is not reported. OtherAspects (safety, stability, reproducibility) are not traceable to the article. (6) Conformality aspectRatio set to 1000, but the studied membrane has ~300:1 (60 μm/0.2 μm) and Si nanopores ~10:1; 1000:1 appears only as a general statement in the introduction, not the experiment. (7) Pressure, reactor, precursors/co-reactants, carrier/purge gas, refractive index (1.96 at 633 nm), and GPC/film thickness for the 220 °C flat-Si run are correct individually, but they are tied to the wrong temperature and dosing set. Corrections needed: split into multiple coherent processes; fix dosing/purge units; align substrate/temperature/cycle parameters per process; correct resistivity unit conversion; remove all nulls or omit optional fields; remove invented composition/ratios and unreported methods; correct conformality aspect ratio to 300:1 (membrane) or 10:1 (Si nanopores).

completeness.rationale: Major omissions and schema violations. (1) Multiple ALD processes are described in the article but only one process is extracted. Missing distinct processes include: (a) ZnO on flat Si at 220 °C with 0.25 s precursor/0.5 s purge pulses for 2500 cycles yielding ~440–480 nm and GPC 1.76 Å/cycle; (b) ZnO on anodic alumina membranes at 85 °C and 250 °C using 0.5 s/20 s pulses (limited depth ~6 µm and ~56 nm near surface); (c) ZnO on membranes at 85 °C using longer 1.5 s/45 s pulses giving conformal ~26–28 nm through 60 µm depth; (d) ZnO on DRIE Si nanopores at 250 °C with 0.5 s/20 s pulses (uniform through 10:1 aspect-ratio holes). Each should be a separate process object. (2) Mixed/incoherent parameters: the single process combines 85 °C (membranes) with flat-Si outcomes (2500 cycles, 440 nm, GPC 1.76 Å/cycle at 220 °C) and dosing times (0.5 s) that belong to nanopore runs, not the flat-Si calibration. Substrate is listed as Silicon wafer while temperature/pulse set aligns with membrane work. (3) Unit errors: dosingTime and purgeTime use unit MilliSEC but numeric values are given in seconds (0.5, 20) rather than 500 and 20000 ms; electrical resistivity is reported as 0.03 Ohm cm in the article, but extracted as 0.03 OHM-M (should be 0.0003 OHM-M if converted). (4) Conformality aspectRatio set to 1000, whereas the article’s membrane AR is ~300:1 and Si holes are ~10:1. (5) Numerous schema violations with null/None where objects with quantity values are required: plasmaPower, nucleationPeriod, flowRates (precursorFlow/coReactantFlow/purgingGasFlow), opticalProperties.absorptionCoefficient and bandGap, uniformity.variation, roughness.value, filmDensity.value, materialProperties.filmComposition.elementalConcentration.values; deviceProperties fields are present but null. Such nulls are not compliant and not traceable to the article. (6) Unsupported values: filmComposition.atomicRatio set to 1:1 with XRD is not reported; uniformity variation not reported; safety/reproducibility assertions are not in the article. (7) Missing required/process-relevant details for membrane runs: the longer-pulse condition (1.5 s/45 s), corresponding conformal thicknesses at surface and ~30 µm depth, and temperature 85 °C for ring-supported membranes, 250 °C for ringless membranes. To improve: add separate process entries for each experiment, align temperature/pulsing/substrate with the reported outcomes, correct time units to ms, convert resistivity units correctly, set aspect ratios per structure, remove or fill all nulls only with article-backed values, and omit unsupported composition metrics or provide traceable measurements if present.
